Assignment

Assignment class will keep track of the IT Staff assigned to a ticket.

Category class contains the fields each IT staff is responsible for.

Criterion class is the basis on which ticket feedback is provided.

Employee class pertains to all the employees in a company using the IT Help Desk system.

Feedback

Feedback class contains the evaluation of the IT Staff on the services provided as submitted by Staff.

ForgotPasswordViewModel

ITHelpDeskAdmin

IT Help Desk Admin is the class that obtain the information related to the system admin.

ITStaff

IT Staff is the class that relates to the IT employees in the company who provide end user support through the IT Help Desk system.

KnowledgeBase

Knowledge base is the class that acts as a repository of information related to trubleshooting IT problems that all users can access.

LoginViewModel

ManageLoginsViewModel

RegisterViewModel

ResetPasswordViewModel

SendCodeViewModel

SetPasswordViewModel

Staff

Staff is the class pertaining to the company's employees that are not in the IT department. These are the staff in need of technical support.

Ticket

Ticket is the class that provide information regarding the Staff request for help.

VerifyCodeViewModel

VerifyPhoneNumberViewModel

Enums

ManagerialPosition

The Managerial Position will signify the priority of the ticket created by that particular Staff.

TicketPriority

The ticket priority defines the importance of the ticket, critical being the most important and low is the least important.

TicketStatus

The ticket status defines the progress of the ticket, open: ticket is assigned to IT staff, in-progress: ticket is in the process of being investigated and resolved, resolved: a solution has been put in place but has not yet been validated by Staff, closed: staff has agreed that the incident has been solved and gave feedback on the service received.
